articles.title: Amazon's cloud unit pushes custom AI chips to lure enterprises
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services unveiled new Graviton and Trainium roadmaps aimed at lowering inference costs for corporate AI workloads.

articles.title: Prime refresh and grocery expansion keep Amazon's retail engine humming
articles.summary: Analysts note accelerating Prime adoption and new Amazon Fresh formats as key growth catalysts for the retail segment.

articles.title: Advertising profits bolster Amazon ahead of next earnings report
articles.summary: Advertising services continue to post double-digit growth, helping fund ongoing logistics and content investments.
